## function_createFloatingUI
> **createFloatingUI**(`propsConfig`?): [`FloatingUI`](#floatingui)

Defined in: [core/src/services/floatingUI.ts:103](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/floatingUI.ts#L103)

Create a floating UI service.

The returned service includes the patch method to patch the states, the stores to track the states and directives to apply.

### Parameters

#### propsConfig?

[`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`FloatingUIProps`](#floatinguiprops)\>

the props config for the floating UI service

### Returns

[`FloatingUI`](#floatingui)

the floating UI service

## type alias_FloatingUI
> **FloatingUI**: [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`FloatingUIProps`](#floatinguiprops), [`FloatingUIState`](#floatinguistate), `object`, [`FloatingUIDirectives`](#floatinguidirectives)\>

Defined in: [core/src/services/floatingUI.ts:93](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/floatingUI.ts#L93)

Represents the type returned by the `createFloatingUI` function.

This type is used to define the structure and behavior of the Floating UI component.
